intro: Moricandia nitens, commonly known as the slender moricandia, is a flowering plant native to Central Asia. It is a member of the Brassicaceae family, which includes mustard and cabbage plants. The plant is characterized by its slender, erect stems and small, yellow flowers that bloom in early summer. Its leaves are alternate, linear, and often covered with fine hairs. Moricandia nitens is typically found in dry, rocky habitats and is adapted to arid environments.
